smarttrolleygui.slideshow

Class Slide

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane
              • smarttrolleygui.slideshow.Slide
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Slide
extends javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane
    SmartTrolley An instance of this object contains all the information required to render a particular slideshow.
    Version:
    V1.0 [Date Created: 24 May 2014] This class also sets up an anchor pane to display all PWS specified media inputs on, for slideshow show, V3.0 [Date Created: 26 May 2014]
    Author:
    Prashant Chakravarty, Checked By: Alasdair 29 May2014, Alick Jacklin, Matthew Wells(V2.0), Alasadair Munday (V3.0), Checked By: Prashant Chakravarty [29 May 2014]

    • Constructor Detail

      • Slide

        public Slide(double xScaler,
     double yScaler,
     java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.shape.Shape> graphicsList,
     java.util.ArrayList<SlideImage> imageList,
     java.util.ArrayList<AudioHandler> audioList,
     java.util.ArrayList<SlideText> textList,
     java.util.ArrayList<SlideVideo> videoList,
     double seconds)
        Constructor takes in lists, and places objects from those lists into the Slide, based on self defined locations. Also takes in scaling factors and scales objects and their locations based on them.

        Displays product information

        Parameters:
        xScaler - - scales the width and x-position of objects placed on the slideshow
        yScaler - - scales the height and y-position of objects placed on the slideshow
        graphicsList - - sorts a list of objects of type graphics, contains all relevant information on the graphic
        imageList - - sorts a list of objects of type image, contains all relevant information on the image
        audioList - - sorts a list of objects of type audio, contains all relevant information on the audio
        textList - - sorts a list of objects of type text, contains all relevant information on the text
        videoList - - sorts a list of objects of type video, contains all relevant information on the video
        seconds - - Duration in seconds

        Date Modified: 29 May 2014
